28
Pillar I: Strengthening  
Our CommunitiesPillar II: Driving Diversity and Inclusion  
& Supporting Our PeoplePillar III: A Focus on Responsible Business Practices  
& Sound Corporate GovernanceConclusion & 
Looking AheadAppendix Introduction
Conclusion & Looking Ahead
We are proud of our record of corporate responsibility and look 
forward to building on this legacy. This is our inaugural ESG Report, 
and as we continue on our journey as a public company, we look 
forward to further integrating our ESG initiatives with our business 
objectives and to reporting on our continued progress. 
We believe that strengthening our communities, driving diversity  
and inclusion, supporting our people, and focusing on responsible 
business practices and sound corporate governance will be 
instrumental to our long-term financial success.
